contextId.information: Here "brother" means fellow Christians. "Only those who do righteousness are from God, and only those who love their brothers are from God" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: Whoever does not do what is righteous is not from God; neither is the one who does not love his brother

contextId.information: We should not act as Cain acted. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
The verb "love" is assumed from the first half of this sentence. AT: "but show that you truly love people by helping them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
